title: Disney+ and Jim Henson Co. Make Alien Talk Show Earth to Ned
text:
Photo: Disney+

If you love aliens, Muppets and talk shows, your chest is going to burst (in a good way!) once you read about The Jim Henson Company’s new half-hour talk show, which Disney+ just gave a straight to series order. According to The Hollywood Reporter, Earth to Ned will star our titular intergalactic host, an alien who has become consumed with our planet’s celebrity culture. With his trusty lieutenant Cornelius by his side, Ned interviews celebrity guests, and “the more Ned learns about our human culture, the more obsessed he becomes.” Keep that optimism alive, Ned!

Dazzled by Earth’s admittedly superior late-night history, Ned and Cornelius work to create “the ultimate talk show — making Ned a celebrity and putting him further off-mission.” That original mission? Surveying the planet for an upcoming invasion. Ned will just have to conquer Disney+, which launches November 12, first, then the world.
description: Disney+ and The Jim Henson Company are making Earth to Ned, a talk show starring an alien puppet who interviews celebrity guests.
